rpgonline.abt

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.abt.Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TagBoolean, TagByte, TagChar, TagDouble, TagFloat, TagGroup, TagInt, TagLong, TagShort, TagString

    public abstract class Tag
extends Object
implements Serializable, Cloneable
    A representation of an ABTTag.
    Author:
    Tomas
    See Also:
